content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 20, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 23}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 37}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 52, "index": 40}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 41}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft blue_carpet, I need to place 2 blue_wool side by side in the crafting table. I have 2 blue_wool at slot 26, therefore I will first move one of them into the crafting table at slot 1.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 20, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 23}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 37}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 52, "index": 40}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 41}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I need to move the other blue_wool to the right of the one I just moved. Therefore, I will move the blue_wool from slot 26 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "blue_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 20, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 23}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 37}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 52, "index": 40}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 41}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the blue_carpet, I need to move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 3
